text: Depict a vibrant green frog wearing cute, miniature swimming goggles. The frog is engaged in a day-to-day human-like activity: it sits at a small, round table in a tiny home-like setting, sipping hot tea from a delicate porcelain cup. To add to the humor and charm, the frog wears a pair of spectacles precariously perched at the end of its nose. A newspaper painted with desaturated watercolors and blurbs of unreadable text sits open on the table, further emphasizing the frog's human-like circumstances.
